CustomField.description: created for April 2015 Direct Marketing campaign run out of Business Operations. intended to capture 3 character code on Postcards and Letters.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If caller received a postcard or letter, ask for Keycode listed toward bottom of mailer. If caller received a mailer but can't retrieve the Keycode, please enter '123' here.
CustomField.label: Keycode
